tool.name: GATE NamedEntityRecognizer v2.2.0
tool.help:
HELP ====
GATE Named Entity Recognizer
The following annotation types are required:
* http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token
The following annotation types are produced:
* http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Date * http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Person * http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Location * http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Organization
